mapper.select: SELECT SU.USER_ID AS USER_ID , SU.EMP_NO AS NO_EMP , SU.USER_NM AS NM_USER , SU.DEPT_ID AS ID_DEPT , SD.DEPT_NM AS NM_DEPT , SU.TITLE_CD AS CD_TITLE , SC.CODE_NAME AS NM_TITLE , SU.EMAIL_DS AS DS_EMAIL , SU.PHONE_NO AS NO_PHONE , SU.MOBILE_NO AS NO_MOBILE , SU.COMPANY_CD AS CD_COMPANY , TC.NM_COMPANY AS NM_COMPANY FROM SYS_USER SU LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS_DEPARTMENT SD ON SU.DEPT_ID = SD.DEPT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS_CODE SC ON SU.TITLE_CD = SC.CODE AND CODE_CATEGORY_ID = 'CD_TITLE' LEFT OUTER JOIN TBS_COMPANY TC ON SU.COMPANY_CD = TC.CD_COMPANY WHERE SU.USER_ID = #{USER_ID}
